title: Reformulation in Translation: Translation Units, Procedures, and Resources

media:group.media:title: Reformulation in Translation: Translation Units, Procedures, and Resources
media:group.media:description: In this video I discuss the most critical step in the translation process: reformulation, which involves the process of finding equivalents for each translation unit in the source text as you construct the target text. I explain the notion of translation unit or segment, define and give examples of various "translation procedures," and explain several of the tools and resources used by professional and amateur translators.
